Title: Establishes the New York state energy storage siting task force
Summary: Establishes the New York state energy storage siting task force to review the findings and recommendations of the Inter-Agency Fire Safety Working Group, summarize other current data and research and provide recommendations including any recommendations for where more data may be required.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the New York state energy storage siting task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
